shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dawit “Psalter” (fols. 2r-153ra) I-1) Mäzmurä Dawit “Psalms of David” (fols. 2r-124v) I-2) Mäḥalǝyä näbiyat “The Canticles of the Prophets” (fols. 124v-135v) I-3) Mäḥalǝyä mäḥalǝy “Song of Songs” (fols. 136r-141r) I-4) Wǝddase Maryam “Praise of Mary” (fols. 141va-149va) I-5) ʾAnqäṣä bǝrhan “The Gate of Light” (fols. 149va-153ra)
Additio 1.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. was rebound. The sewing has been repaired with recent threads. Some fols. are stained with wax and water: e.g., fols. 3r-9r. A rectangular piece is cut out from fol. 25r (at the right bottom margin). Holes and tears amended on fols. 17-19, 23, 25, 53, 57, 97, 111, 118.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (re-used; the back board is broken). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and the tail of the codex.

squires.squire: I(9; s.l.: 1, stub after 9/fols. 1r-9v) – II(8/fols. 10r-17v) – III(8/fols. 18r-25v) – IV(8/fols. 26r-33v) – V(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, before after 3/fols. 34r-41v) – VI(8/fols. 42r-49v) – VII(8/fols. 50r-57v) – VIII(8/fols. 58r-65v) – IX(8/fols. 66r-73v) – X(8/fols. 74r-81v) – XI(8/fols. 82r-89v) – XII(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, before after 2/fols. 90r-97v) – XIII(8/fols. 98r-105v) – XIV(8/fols. 106r-113v) – XV(8/fols. 114r-121v) – XVI(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, before after 3/fols. 122r-129v) – XVII(8/fols. 130r-137v) – XVIII(8/fols. 138r-145v) – XIX(8/fols. 146r-153v).

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: all data are for fol. 3r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-4, I-5: all data are for fol. 143r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Numeral ፲ has the rare form with the ring (e.g., fols. 9r, 149vb).

rubrications.rubrication: The name of St. Mary in Texts I-4 and I-5; several lines in the incipit page of all texts, incipit of sections of Text I-4; titles and numbers of Pss., titles of each canticle or chapter; a few lines of each 10th Ps.; names of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 and the traditional interpretation of the name of the second letter Bet (the first letter Aleph and the interpretations of the other letters are missing); letters ይ and ብ in the word ይሴብሕዎ in Ps. 148, letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 150, letters ባ, ክ and ዎ in the word ይባርክዎ in the Canticle of the Three Youths; doxology at the end of Text I-1; a few words or their abbreviation (introducing each strophe) in Text I-4 and I-5; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

abbreviations.abbreviation: Text I-4: ሠ፡ for ሠረቀ፡ (fols. 141va-142ra) እስ፡ for እስመ፡ (fols. 142va-143va) ኵ፡ for ኵሉ፡ (fol. 144ra-144vb) ናዓ፡(ብ) for ናዓብየኪ፡ (fols. 145va-146va) ለባ፡ for ለባሕቲትኪ፡ (fol. 147rab) ተ፡(ፈ) for ተፈሥሒ፡ (fol. 148ra-148va) ወ፡(በ) for ወበእንተዝ፡ (fols. 148vb-149rb) ሰ፡ ቅ፡ for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት፡ (fols. 142ra-149rb) ሰ፡ ቅድ፡ for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት፡ (e.g., fols. 142vb, 143rab) Text I-5: ወበ፡(እን)for ወበእንተዝ፡ (fols. 150rb-152vb) (ወል)፡ ሣ፡ ይ(ክ)፡ ሰ፡ ቅ፡ for ወልድኪ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ይክፍለነ፡ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት፡ (fols. 150vb-152vb)

otherdetails.otherdetail: - The numbering of Pss. (in a secondary hand?) is irregular and partly incorrect: e.g., Ps. 22: ፲፫, 23: ፲፬, 33: ፳፬, 110: ፻፳ etc., 118: ፻፲፯. - Some Pss. are numbered in a later hand in pen: e.g., fols. 10r-19r.

additional.cont: Fol. 153rb: Monastic genealogy (from St. Anthony to ˀƎwosṭatewos).
additional.det: Written in the main hand or in a very similar hand.

extras.extra: - Tämälläs-signs, in the shape of a cross, indicating the place where the omissions, written in the margins, belong: fols. 5r l.7, 11r l.11, 15v l.7, 22r l.20, 44v l.17, 52v l.1, 62r l.22, 81r l.3, 83v l.12, 103r l.14. - Omitted letters inserted interlineally: e.g., fols. 13v, 20v, 32r, 59v, 64r, 75r. - Omissions inserted in small script interlineally or at the end of the line, in different secondary hands: e.g., fols. 9v, 23v, 29r, 31r, 55r, 75v, 90v, 106r, 115v. - Corrections written over erased words and passages, in different secondary hands: e.g., fols. 11r, 14v, 17r, 18v, 23rv, 25r, 35r, 53v, 71v, 74r, 77v, 92r, 98r, 112rv, 113r, 127r. - Erasures: e.g., fols. 22r, 25v, 29v, 109v, 110r, 119rv, 123r, 125v, 145rab. - Excerpt from Ps. 117 written on fol. 1r. - Doxology written in red, in a secondary hand: fol. 141v. - Some names, e.g., Gǝrima Gäräzihar, ʾAbrǝha Gäräzihar, Ḥagos Gäräzihar, are crudely written in the upper margin in pen, in a recent hand: fols. 81v, 82v, 83v, 84v, 85v, 86v, 114v. - Scribbles and crude drawings in ink, pencil and pen: e.g., fols. 1r (older), 1v, 65v, 86r, 113v, 148r, 153r-v (older).

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Daily readings are indicated by the names of the days of the week written in the upper margin, in pen and pencil: ዘሰኑይ: fol. 2r ዘሠሉስ: fol. 26r ዘረቡዕ: fol. 50v ዘሐሙስ: fols. 80r, 86r ዘዓርብ: fol. 110v በእሁድ: fol. 78r.

frames.frame: Fol. 25v (explicit page of Ps. 30): coloured (red and black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 44v (incipit page of Ps. 51): coloured (red and black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 85v (incipit page of Ps. 101): coloured (red and black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 124v (incipit page of Text I-2): coloured (red and black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 135v (explicit page of Text I-2): coloured (red and black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 141r (explicit page of Text I-3) coloured (red and black) ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 153ra (explicit page of Text I-5) coloured (red and black) ornamental band; geometric motifs.
